directions: Preheat oven to 425°F. Place pie crust on cookie sheet. Place cheese and sausage in pie crust. Beat together yolks, egg, salt and red pepper flakes. Mix in cream. Pour into pie crust. Place tomato in circular pattern atop quiche. Sprinkle with oregano. Bake 15 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 300°F. Bake until tester inserted in center comes out clean, about 40 minutes. Let stand 10 minutes. Serve warm.
ingredients: 3 sweet Italian sausages, crumbled and cooked
1 large tomato, halved crosswise, seeded and thinly sliced
title: Sausage and Tomato Quiche
